nodes.bodyText: curious as to why batch mode is being removed here ?
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -84,14 +84,19 @@ SONATYPE_PASSWORD=your_sonatype_password
 VERSION=xx-version-to-release-xx
 
 # now from latest master, prepare the release. We are intentionally deferring pushing commits
-./mvnw --batch-mode -s ./.settings.xml -Prelease -nsu -DreleaseVersion=$VERSION -Darguments="-DskipTests -Dlicense.skip=true" release:prepare  -DpushChanges=false

nodes.bodyText: because it is manual anyway. that was my thinking. we have batch mode for the release scripts and this was copy/paste from that.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -84,14 +84,19 @@ SONATYPE_PASSWORD=your_sonatype_password

nodes.bodyText: okay, only thing is that you'll have these annoying download progress indicators in the log etc but i guess that's not a big issue.
